item.description:
What – Singles Dance with DJ, a great sound and light system, food, martinis, wine & optional ice breaking activities.

When - Saturday 21 Feb 2009 .... 7:00-12:00.

Where – Holiday Inn - Rockland(formerly the Radisson) - 781-871-0545

Food – the Holiday Inn has graciously agreed to create a special pub style menu for appetizers and light sandwiches. They also will have a martini menu available for your responsible drinking pleasure.

Cocktails from 7:00-9:00
Optional Speed Dating from 730-830. First come first served
As well as Ice breakers for non-speed daters

Dancing with a great DJ, clean sound system and light show.

DJ – Cash Bar – Full yummy Menu.

$ 15

As Always Dress to Impress - No Jeans, T-shirts or Sneakers Please
item.how_to_find_us: We have the whole hall - and ask for Roger

group.name: Boston Metro Hike Bike & Social Club

item.name: Single Mingle @ Rockland Holiday Inn (formerly the Radisson) 7-12
